Here is the list of signs in $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Aries are naturally competitive and ambitious, but can be impulsive and reckless at times.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Tauruses value stability and security, which can make them resistant to change or risk-taking.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Geminis are quick-witted and adaptable, making them well-suited for fast-paced environments.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Cancers are empathetic and nurturing, but can be overly sensitive and emotional at times.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Leos are charismatic and confident, but can be prideful and dominant if not checked.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Virgos are analytical and practical, making them excellent problem-solvers.
7. Libra - 6/10 - Librans value fairness and harmony, which can make them indecisive or overly concerned with others' opinions.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Scorpions are passionate and perceptive, but can be intense and secretive if not balanced.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Sagittarians are optimistic and adventurous, but can be blunt and tactless at times.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Capricorns value discipline and responsibility, which can make them overly critical or perfectionistic.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Aquarians are independent and humanitarian, making them natural leaders in social causes.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Pisces are imaginative and empathetic, but can be dreamy and unrealistic if not grounded.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics.
